reviewText: So the tape that I got was sped up so I wasn't able to understand anything.

If you have any interest in steam trains, this double tape set is a one-stop wonder. Everything that you have ever wanted to know about the history and function of steam trains is contained on this two episode set. There are tons of interviews of people who worked the rails, along with rare archival footage from back in the day and modern footage of steam, like those run on the Union Pacific. You'll love this.
